column1: #: description: The acceptance- and efficiency-corrected $\mathrm{B}^{0}_{\mathrm{s}}/\mathrm{B}^{+}$ yields in PbPb collisions at $\sqrt{s_{NN}}=5.02$. The results are shown as a function of the event $\langle N_{part} \rangle$.
